name: Ouroboros [Looping Jobs 2022]
author: dragon
description: Adds looping jobs. This is a temp fix version while I'm having computer issues.
description_long:
Loopable Jobs:
*Glover and Glover (unless you are climbing the ranks- ambition prevents you from settling in. Will also stop every time your job situation changes.)
*Manual Labor
*Physican Job
*Multiple Books at Morlands (up to 4 at a time)

Looping requires reason or health, depending on the job- since normally you'd have to wait for them on cooldown.
Credit to Kv√≤the for original mod and the one altered image in the mod.
